page.title: 08"The Mountain"
page.content: The mountain is a hill outside the village. I go up the mountain a few times a week. i go with my friends. We take our binoculars with us to go bird watching, we see Starlings, Thrushes, Blue Tits, Crows and Wood Pigeon. We sometimes see Rabbits, Snakes, Sheep, Cows and Horses. Some people take their dogs up there. Some boys take motorbikes up there and ride them along a course. You can walk along the mountain for about one and a half miles and go down the other side on to the common. The reason l like the mountain is that it is close to my home, it is good fun to go up there to play games like hide and seek,and spy on people!
